data.title: Snoop Dogg‚Äôs brother, Bing Worthington, dead at 44
data.meta_description: Snoop Dogg's brother Bing Worthington has died at age 44.
data.text:
Snoop Dogg‚Äôs brother Bing Worthington has died at age 44.

The cause of death was not disclosed, but the ‚ÄúGin and Juice‚Äù rapper posted a series of Instagram tributes to Worthington on Friday, captioning a picture of them in a dressing room, ‚Äú@badabing33 always made us laugh üíôüôèüèæüò¢ u bac with moms.‚Äù

Snoop‚Äôs mother, Beverly Tate, died at the age of 70 in October 2021.

The rapper also shared another Instagram photo Friday of him and Worthington with their other brother, Jerry, in a cemetery.

The Post has contacted reps for Snoop for comment.

Worthington was Snoop‚Äôs half-brother on his mom‚Äôs side and worked professionally with the rapper as a roadie before becoming his tour manager.

‚ÄúI started from the bottom, I ain‚Äôt just become the tour manager, I was just the road guy. I worked my way to the top,‚Äù Worthington told Vice in 2016.

‚ÄúEven though I‚Äôm [Snoop‚Äôs] brother he didn‚Äôt give me a top-ranked position. You can‚Äôt just become a president without knowing anything about being the president,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúYou have to learn.‚Äù

Worthington also told the outlet that his career included doing ‚Äúa lot of entrepreneur s‚Äìt,‚Äù including Snoop‚Äôs 1966 Cadillac DeVille and Dogg Skateboards.

‚ÄúYou name it. I come up with a lot of great concepts,‚Äù Worthington said.

Worthington also had his own music group, Lifestyle. Their song ‚ÄúTha Jump Off‚Äù appeared in the 2006 rom-com ‚ÄúVan Wilder 2.‚Äù

Some of Snoop‚Äôs famous friends showed their support for the rapper in the Instagram comments.

‚ÄúMy condolences, bro,‚Äù rapper and producer D-Nice wrote.

Tyrese Gibson added, ‚Äúüôè stay strong big bro‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm sorry this happened‚Ä¶.. Prayers love and light to you and your family‚Ä¶..‚Äù

‚ÄúSorry for all your Loss Brother,‚Äù Tamar Braxton added.

Tyrese commented, ‚Äústay strong big bro‚Ä¶. I‚Äôm sorry this happened‚Ä¶.. Prayers love and light to you and your family‚Ä¶..‚Äù
